comments:
Build 20030114.

Attempted to upgrade to new build.  Started with existing workspace.
Autobuild off.  First deleted plugins to be re-imported.  Imported the new 
plugins.
"Replace with latest" for all repository projects within the workspace.
Checked out New Project (one of my repository projects "disappeared" somehow).
Turned autobuild on.
Tried to do a full rebuild, but my workspace hung.  Killed Eclipse.  The 
following in the log.

Are you sure you are using build I20030114? The class mentioned in the 
traceback (EclipsePhantomSynchronizer) was removed since build I20030107. This 
traceback makes sense if you installed an older build over I20030107 and tried 
to launch.
